QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when date_part('day', now()-last_accessed_date) < $1 then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when last_accessed_date is null then title || ' is never used.'
    else title || ' is last used ' || age(current_date, last_accessed_date) || ' ago.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_secretsmanager_secret;
